Habitry Source

The online manual for the Habitry Method

Start Using Habitry   or   Contribute

Build habits more easily with teams

The Habitry Method is
social technology
"Social Technology" is a phrase we made up. Click to learn more.
you can use to build any habits in teams. We like to say that Habitry is both cutting-edge psychology and ancient wisdom.

The Habitry Method has been created by dozens of community volunteers, and when you’re ready, you can pitch in and help us make it even better. Thousands of people are using the Habitry Method to build new habits and you can too.
